item.description:
This gives us a great opportunity to enjoy a delicious Italian meal at one of Boston’s finest Italian restaurants for only $33.09 (not including drinks, tax and gratuity)

Located in Arlington, "Ristorante Olivio" is in a great location for a dinner on a week night, after a busy work day.

Our reservation is for 7:00pm, so we’ll meet at the bar area at 6:45pm, to enjoy a drink and talk before dinner.

For more information:

Restaurant week's info about "Ristorante Olivio" and a link to the menu:
http://www.bostonusa....

You can also order off of their regular menu. Restaurant website:
http://www.ristorante...

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Restaurant Week at "Ristorante Olivio" in Arlington
